name: Swansea Swim
description: The Swansea Swim takes place in the sheltered Prince of Wales Dock. Distances include 750m, 1.9km, and 3km, making it perfect for beginners and seasoned swimmers alike.

name: Swansea Triathlon
description: A fast and flat sprint triathlon in the heart of Swansea. 750m swim, 20km closed road bike, 5km run.

name: Fishguard Swim
description: A sea swim in the beautiful Fishguard Bay. Options for 1.9km and 950m.

name: Wales Triathlon
description: The Wales Triathlon is a middle distance race (1.9k/90k/21k) set in Pembrokeshire. Known for its challenging bike course and stunning coastal run.

name: Slateman Triathlon
description: The Slateman is an iconic adventure triathlon in Snowdonia. Swim in Llyn Padarn, cycle through the mountains, and run in the slate quarries.

name: The Wales Swim
description: Part of the Long Course Weekend, this is a massive swim event on North Beach, Tenby. 1.9km and 3.8km options with a huge atmosphere.

name: Llandudno Triathlon
description: A classic seaside triathlon with a swim off Llandudno beach, a lap of the Great Orme on the bike, and a run along the promenade.

name: Snowman Triathlon
description: Known as the toughest triathlon in the UK. Swim in Llyn Mymbyr, bike through Snowdonia, and run up Moel Siabod.

name: The Wales Swimrun
description: A challenging swimrun event along the Pembrokeshire Coast Path. Full and Sprint distances available.

name: Saundersfoot Triathlon
description: A sprint triathlon in the popular seaside village of Saundersfoot. Swim in the bay, bike the local hills, and run through the tunnels.

name: Saundersfoot Swim
description: Open water swim event in Saundersfoot Bay. 1.9km and 950m distances.

name: Mumbles Triathlon
description: Olympic and Sprint distance triathlon starting in Mumbles. Swim in the bay, bike on Gower roads, and run along the seafront.

name: Mumbles Swim
description: Swim event alongside the Mumbles Triathlon. 750m and 1500m options.

name: Tenby Boxing Day Swim
description: The legendary Tenby Boxing Day Swim is a festive tradition where brave swimmers plunge into the chilly waters of North Beach in fancy dress.

name: The Big Welsh Swim
description: Swim the entire length of Llyn Padarn (up to 9km) or choose shorter distances. Wetsuit and skins categories.

name: The Hurly Burly
description: A fast 10km swim in the Mawddach Estuary on the incoming tide. Starts in Barmouth and finishes in Penmaenpool.

name: Gower Swim Festival
description: A series of swims around the stunning Gower peninsula, including Langland to Caswell.

name: Porthcawl Christmas Swim
description: Thousands gather at Sandy Bay for this traditional Christmas morning dip to raise money for charity.

name: Saundersfoot NYD Swim
description: Welcoming the New Year with a mass dip in the sea at Saundersfoot. Fancy dress encouraged.

name: Whitesands NYD Swim
description: A brave New Year's Day swim at the spectacular Whitesands Bay near St Davids.

name: Barry Island NYD Swim
description: Join the crowds at Whitmore Bay for the annual New Year's Day dip.

name: Llandudno Boxing Day Dip
description: Organized by the Lions Club, a festive dip in the sea at Llandudno North Shore.

name: Bala Lake Swim
description: Various distance swims in Llyn Tegid, Wales' largest natural lake.

name: Caldey Island Swim
description: A challenging 4km ocean swim from Caldey Island back to Tenby mainland.

name: Solva Swim
description: A community swim event in the picturesque harbour of Solva.

name: Broad Haven Christmas Pudding Run
description: Not just a run, but ends with a swim!

name: Abersoch NYD Dip
description: The main beach at Abersoch hosts this popular charity dip.

name: Criccieth Boxing Day Dip
description: Festive dip near the castle.

name: Rhyl Boxing Day Dip
description: Fundraiser for the RNLI at Rhyl beach.

name: Walrus Dip
description: Held at Cefn Sidan beach, one of the longest established dips.

name: Morfa Nefyn NYD Dip
description: Charity dip in the sheltered bay.

name: Aberdovey Swim
description: Estuary swim in Aberdovey.

name: World Bog Snorkelling
description: Unique event where competitors snorkel through a peat bog trench.

name: Llyn Padarn Swim
description: Summer swim event in the glacial lake.

name: Cardiff Triathlon
description: Legendary city triathlon in Cardiff Bay. Closed roads.

name: Titan Brecon Middle
description: Middle distance triathlon with a swim in Llangorse Lake.

name: Titan Brecon Olympic
description: Olympic distance triathlon in the Brecon Beacons.

name: Porthcawl Triathlon
description: Standard distance event with a sea swim.

name: Tuska Sprint Triathlon
description: Popular sprint triathlon in Porthcawl.

name: Bala Standard Triathlon
description: Closed road standard distance triathlon swimming in Llyn Tegid.

name: Bala Sprint Triathlon
description: Early season sprint triathlon in Bala.

name: Llanelli Sprint Triathlon
description: North Dock swim and coastal bike/run.

name: Tenby Long Course Weekend
description: Three day festival of Swim, Bike, Run. Do the full distance or individual events.

name: Ironman Wales
description: One of the toughest Ironman courses in the world, with a sea swim in Tenby.

name: Sandman Triathlon
description: Adventure triathlon with a sea swim off Llanddwyn Beach.

name: Sandman Sprint
description: Sprint version of the Sandman.

name: Sandman Legend
description: 70.3 distance of the Sandman.

name: Harlech Triathlon
description: Pool swim (usually) but finishes with 'Storm the Castle' run.

name: Monmouth Aquathlon
description: River Wye swim and run.

name: Brecon Triathlon
description: Pool based sprint but iconic location.

name: WSF Masters

name: Conwy Ascent
